de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server

Interface ISSelfserviceStopword


  • public interface ISSelfserviceStopword
    English:
    see ICWebSelfServiceStopword

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<SelfserviceStopword> loadStopwordsForProject(Connection con, int projectId)
      Loads the list of all stopwords assigned to the project identified by projectId.
      boolean storeStopwordsForProject(Connection con, int projectId, List<SelfserviceStopword> listOfStopwords)
      Stores the list of stopwords into the database and assigns them the project identified by projectId.

    • Method Detail

      • loadStopwordsForProject

        List<SelfserviceStopword> loadStopwordsForProject(Connection con,
                                                int projectId)
                                                  throws SQLException
        Loads the list of all stopwords assigned to the project identified by projectId.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • storeStopwordsForProject

        boolean storeStopwordsForProject(Connection con,
                               int projectId,
                               List<SelfserviceStopword> listOfStopwords)
                                 throws SQLException
        Stores the list of stopwords into the database and assigns them the project identified by projectId. Previously stored stopwords having projectid projectId will be deleted. The projectId of all members of the collection listOfStopwords will be set to the questionSecondIcon argument as a side-effect.
        Parameters:
        con -
        projectId -
        obj -
        Throws:
        SQLException
